data.text: Ule nai ngai, kei'n nangnidiang kaheiwa laikhan, Pathian jarra sakhi kha2:1. chong inthuuk manuscript lekkhat inchu hintia injia Pathian jarra sakhi. kei'n chong inthuuk khat-um manmasi lungsing lungwar chongnga nangnidiang rilmong.
Ajarchu kei'n nangnile kaom suungseng Jisu Christa khat-um cross-ah athina jarra elekleiya kei'n iteii jetzootmong.
khawa jarra kei'n nangnidiang kaheiwa laikhan kei'n ranak kaboi, kachi khat-um intuul le inruoiya kaheiwa; Chuon 18:9
halli kei chongril khat-um chongpui ngaikha inthuuk khat-um manmasi lungsing lungwar chongnga rilmong, takkha Pathian Ratha ranak nuoiya kaleiril,
ajarchu nangni ngamna kha manmasi lungsing lungwarra elekleiya takkha Pathian ranak dungjuiya enasik eii.
Ratha lamtiang kachangjei inmani ngaidiang chu keini'n lungsing lungwar chongnga kinril, takkha akalamangsik hiwa khangnga waikaroon ngai khat-um hiwa khangnga lungsing lungwar dungjuiya emak.
Takkha Pathian'n manmasituol abool ma-ah eini lurna lianna sik-ah i-ngaidonjei mit-ah nimumak inthuuk Pathian lungsing lungwar dungjuiya kinril eii.
Hiwa khangnga waikaroon tuteii innum hiwahi leijetmu; inmani'n inleijet inchu, inmani'n akalur Pumi kha cross-ah leithatnunu.
Takkha2:10. Takkha; manuscript lekkhat inchu hintia injia ajarchu. Pathian'n Ratha diangnga inphut einidiang hiwa ngaihi amalar ajarchu Ratha khan angrakip entok, Pathian inthuukna kha-um entok.
Miring ratha khan ama i-ngaidon rakip kha ijet angnga, Pathian Ratha bitkhan Pathian i-ngaidon kha ajet.
Eini'n niralaangjei Ratha hi manmasituol ratha kha emak takkha Pathian diangnga kajuo Ratha kha eii, hiwahi Pathian in einidiang inapejei rakip ngaihi nijet mintung nasik eii.

Manmasi naminchu lungsing lungwar khan keini'n rilmung, takkha Ratha naminchuna chong ngaikhan Ratha kamujei mi ngaidiang ratha lamtiang kadikkha kinril.2:13. Ratha kaneijei miring ngaidiang; emakli Ratha'n inapeii chong ngaikhan.

Ratha kaneimak mi ngaikha'n Pathian Ratha diangnga inphut kajuo kutchoi ngaikha mumatormu, khawa jarra inmani sik achu kutchoi ngaikha nemna ommak, ajarchu kutchoi ngaikha Ratha kamu ngai inbit jetmatorna innei.
Ratha kanei miring kha'n angrakip chungnga chongtan, takkha ama chu manmasi tuteii chongtan nuoiya ommak.
